text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Heyーー! Hoーー!

text_block_list.name: Participants
text_block_list.text: Heyーー! Hoーー!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Heyーー! Hoーー! Come on everybody!

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
(Amazing, Helios……hehe. 
……Everyone seems to be having fun, I'm glad.)

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: (————Ruby too……she's dazzling.)

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Miracle-san.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: Oh……Zephyr, where's your dress?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
I think I'll get changed soon. 
But……before that.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Miracle-san. 
May I have this dance?

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
——! 
With me……?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Yes. I've been determined to be the first to invite you. 
My special, and precious friend, Miracle-san.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Thank you. You're very important to me too. 
——I'd love to.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: fufu～, this is a pleasant breeze.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
La～la～lalala～♪ 
Come, join me.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
La～la～lalala～♪ 
Ahaha, this tempo's pretty fast……!

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Yes, I feel my heart racing. This warmth…… 
it's like being surrounded by a spring breeze.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: ……Miracle-san, is there no one else you want to dance with?

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: ——eh?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
"I want to dance with someone special" ——that feeling, 
a graceful wind. I accomplished my dream. So, now it's your turn.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
I'm sure, our bond is like this breeze……it may dissipate. 
But still……even so, it's very precious.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
I want "you" to be happy too. 
I want your wishes to come true too.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Surely, you feel it deep within too. 
Even if it's covered in frosty winds.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: Uhm……sorry, I don't, understand……

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text:
Miracle-san. 
I've decided, to be a cleansing wind.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: eh——?
